sentences.english: 1328 - Philip VI is crowned King of France.
sentences.chinese: 1328年的今天，腓力六世加冕成爲法蘭西國王。

sentences.english: Now Philip was of Bethsaida, the city of Andrew and Peter.
sentences.chinese: 這腓力是伯賽大人，和安得烈同城。

sentences.english: 6He asked this only to test him, for he already had in mind what he was going to do.
sentences.chinese: 他說這話是要試驗腓力，他自己原知道要怎樣行。

sentences.english: Philip and Nathanael's story reminds us that Jesus is the main story.
sentences.chinese: 腓力和拿但業的例子提醒我們，耶穌是福音的主角。

sentences.english: My aunt Philips wants you so to get husbands, you can't think.
sentences.chinese: 腓力普姨媽要你們趕快找丈夫，你們可沒有想到吧。

sentences.english: Now Philip was from Bethsaida, of the city of Andrew and Peter.
sentences.chinese: 這腓力是伯賽大人，是安得烈和彼得那城的人。

sentences.english: Their visits to Mrs. Philips were now productive of the most interesting intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 從此她們每次拜訪腓力普太太都獲得了最有趣的消息。

sentences.english: Philip saith unto him, Lord, shew us the Father, and it sufficeth us.
sentences.chinese: 腓力對他說，求主將父顯給我們看，我們就知足了。

sentences.english: And provide them beasts, that they may set Paul on, and bring him safe unto Felix the governor.
sentences.chinese: 也要豫備牲口叫保羅騎上，護送到巡撫腓力斯那裏去。

sentences.english: Philip, like Andrew and Peter, was from the town of Bethsaida.
sentences.chinese: 這腓力是伯賽大人，和安得烈同城。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
Asa (?-870 BC), third king of Judah and fifth king of the House of David (Judaism)
Ahab (9th c. BC), King of Israel, son of Omri and husband of Jezebel, prominent figure in 1 Kings 16-22
Herod the Great (73 BC - 4 BC), Roman-appointed king of Judea (37-4 BC)
Matthew/St Matthew the evangelist/less common variant of 馬太|马太[Ma3 tai4] (preferred by the Catholic Church)
